module.name: Call Event Logging
module.changelog: *14.0.2.13* FREEPBX-19854 Fixing comparison operator for CDRUSEGMT *14.0.2.12* FREEPBX-19506 Search option under Call Event Logging is not functional *14.0.2.11* FREEPBX-18944 take control of cel_odbc.conf, move usegmttime into cel_odbc.con under cel context *14.0.2.10* Fixing FREEPBX-18783 Undefined index issue *14.0.2.9* FREEPBX-18632 *14.0.2.8* Fix playback and downloads *14.0.2.7* FREEPBX-10883 FREEPBX-11014 CEL within UCP - PHP Fatal error *14.0.2.6* FREEPBX-16337 CDRDBHOST not following AMPDBHOST when empty *14.0.2.5* FREEPBX-17187 Don't set all fields to empty default when a new search is issued in Call Event Logging *14.0.2.4* FREEPBX-15626 On clicking search button redirects to the home page. *14.0.2.3* FREEPBX-14302 jPlayer takes control of all input in UCP 14 *14.0.2.2* FREEPBX-15139 Recordings playing/downloading in call history doesn't work with multiple widget in the same dashboard *14.0.2.1* Adjustments in UCP *14.0.2* Support new UCP *14.0.1* Merge from 13
